name: .RCG File Extension
summary: Learn about .RCG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Data file used by Recog, a program that learns and recognizes characters and symbols; contains character recognition data that enables Recog to identify mouse-drawn characters.

content: The RCG file is continually updated by Recog as the program "learns" hand-writing or mouse-drawing styles. Recog has been used to teach students about neural networks.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
